edu.byu.cs.superasteroids.ship_builder

Interface IShipBuildingController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IController, IGameDelegate

    public interface IShipBuildingController
extends IController, IGameDelegate
    The ShipBuildingView uses this interface to call the functions found below.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void loadContent(ContentManager content)
      The ShipBuildingView calls this function as it is created.
      void onPartSelected(int index)
      The part selection fragments call this function when a part is selected from the parts list.
      void onResume()
      The ShipBuildingView calls this function when ship building has resumed.
      void onSlideView(IShipBuildingView.ViewDirection direction)
      The ShipBuildingView calls this function when the user makes a swipe/fling motion in the screen.
      void onStartGamePressed()
      The ShipBuildingView calls this function is called when the start game button is pressed.
      void onViewLoaded(IShipBuildingView.PartSelectionView partView)
      The ship building view calls this function when a part selection view is loaded.

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.byu.cs.superasteroids.base.IController

        getView, setView

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.byu.cs.superasteroids.base.IGameDelegate

        draw, unloadContent, update

    • Method Detail

      • onViewLoaded

        void onViewLoaded(IShipBuildingView.PartSelectionView partView)
        The ship building view calls this function when a part selection view is loaded. This function should be used to configure the part selection view. Example: Set the arrows for the view in this function.
        Parameters:
        partView -

      • loadContent

        void loadContent(ContentManager content)
        The ShipBuildingView calls this function as it is created. Load ship building content in this function.
        Specified by:
        loadContent in interface IGameDelegate
        Parameters:
        content - An instance of the content manager. This should be used to load images and sound.

      • onSlideView

        void onSlideView(IShipBuildingView.ViewDirection direction)
        The ShipBuildingView calls this function when the user makes a swipe/fling motion in the screen. Respond to the user's swipe/fling motion in this function.
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction of the swipe/fling.

      • onPartSelected

        void onPartSelected(int index)
        The part selection fragments call this function when a part is selected from the parts list. Respond to the part selection in this function.
        Parameters:
        index - The list index of the selected part.

      • onStartGamePressed

        void onStartGamePressed()
        The ShipBuildingView calls this function is called when the start game button is pressed.

      • onResume

        void onResume()
        The ShipBuildingView calls this function when ship building has resumed. Reset the Camera and the ship position as needed when this is called.
